page.title: 13Family Life cont.
page.content: {A day in my life, by Lucy.} I got up, dressed and went in the bathroom to clean my teeth and went down to have my breakfast. I had Sugar Puffs, after that we washed up and wiped up and brushed our hair and went to school. We did our shape book and when we finished that we went out to play. We played cricket because no-body wanted to play Bristol Bulldogs. After that we did Comprehension cards. Then we got the tables ready for lunch. Then into the library to work on the computer. After that we had lunch and went out to play. We did sewing in the afternoon, and we had service. After school we went to Ashleys and played with Sam the dog, then we went back home and had tea. After tea we played rounders in the playing field and I got two people out. Then we came back, watched T.V. and went to bed.
